data.message: Your track "Walk On Water" fucking blows. What happen to you Em? Maybe you are past your prime. Maybe it is time to set down the mic. Like you told Benzino "No one wants to hear their grandfather rap" #TheKingMightOfDied Eminem

replies.message: Walk on water is the worst song I think he ever made pure shit.
You are retarded😂😂  that song was one of the deepest songs he has written.  No one is even on his level.  What was so wrong with it?

Its garbage, thats whats wrong with it. Sounded like he had ran up 10 flights then started recording the hook the 🎶 even the verses had some good spot but it was composed like an amature mumble rapper

Its all in the lyric 
That was a straight up message 
Do you actually listen or do you just skim trough it ?

People that like the song has been in denile since the encore. It's insane to say the walk on water song is good.. Why? Because his lyrics where deep? Tf every other rapper has deep shit don't make the song good when his flow didn't match the beat and that one girl sounding like a over qweaking seagull.

Its all opinion some people like the song some people don't i like the message other then that its ok am just going to wait for the album but people going to like what they want if kool keith can be way past his prime and still make music and people still loving his new albums why can't em to each his own
Sorry they don't do child rap!
Haters will hate Em's pretty young for his age and pretty fucking good too! It's your problem.
Ha ha I love the opposing comments ha ha ha XD
